articles.title: ‘Dysfunctional’: Scathing hockey culture report released - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Hockeyroos coach Paul Gaudoin has resigned in the wake of a scathing review that found “dysfunctional culture and leadership” in the sport “not conducive to athlete wellbeing or sustained on-field success”.
articles.content: Hockeyroos coach Paul Gaudoin has resigned in the wake of a scathing review that found dysfunctional culture and leadership in the sport not conducive to athlete wellbeing or sustained on-field succe… [+1999 chars]
